cocktails.name: 櫻花吉姆雷特
cocktails.taste: 微甜帶有櫻花的淡雅香氣
cocktails.taste_en: Slightly sweet with the delicate aroma of cherry blossoms
cocktails.description: 以琴酒為基底，加入櫻花利口酒與幾滴檸檬汁，仿若春日賞花。
cocktails.description_en: Based on gin, added with cherry blossom liqueur and a few drops of lemon juice, as if enjoying the cherry blossoms in spring.

cocktails.name: 暗夜咖啡
cocktails.taste: 濃厚的咖啡風味，帶有威士忌的溫暖
cocktails.taste_en: Rich coffee flavor with the warmth of whiskey
cocktails.description: 威士忌與冷萃咖啡的完美融合，佐以一點點糖漿與鮮奶油點綴。
cocktails.description_en: The perfect blend of whiskey and cold brew coffee, garnished with a little syrup and cream.

cocktails.name: 熱帶風情
cocktails.taste: 果味香甜，隱約可感受到熱帶水果的酸甜
cocktails.taste_en: Fruity and sweet, with a subtle taste of tropical fruit sourness
cocktails.description: 將芒果汁、鳳梨汁與朗姆酒混合，再加入一抹藍柑橘酒調色，帶來視覺與味覺的雙重享受。
cocktails.description_en: Mix of mango juice, pineapple juice, and rum, with a touch of blue curacao for coloring, providing a dual enjoyment of vision and taste.

cocktails.name: 紫羅蘭女伯爵
cocktails.taste: 淡淡的花香與伯爵茶的絕妙搭配
cocktails.taste_en: A subtle floral scent perfectly matched with Earl Grey tea
cocktails.description: 結合伏特加、紫羅蘭甜酒與一撮伯爵茶粉，創造出典雅而神秘的風味。
cocktails.description_en: Combining vodka, violet liqueur, and a pinch of Earl Grey tea powder to create an elegant and mysterious flavor.

cocktails.name: 星夜魔法
cocktails.taste: 深邃的黑醋栗香氣，伴隨著微微的檸檬清新
cocktails.taste_en: Deep blackcurrant aroma with a hint of fresh lemon
cocktails.description: 以琴酒為基底，加入黑醋栗利口酒及新鮮檸檬汁，製成星空般神奇的色澤。
cocktails.description_en: Based on gin, added with blackcurrant liqueur and fresh lemon juice, creating a magical starry color.

cocktails.name: 迷霧森林
cocktails.taste: 清新的薄荷與松露的獨特混合，帶來如森林般的清新
cocktails.taste_en: The unique mix of fresh mint and truffle, bringing a forest-like freshness
cocktails.description: 融合伏特加、薄荷香料、以及少許的松露油，創造出霧氣繚繞的森林感。
cocktails.description_en: Combines vodka, mint essence, and a bit of truffle oil to create a misty forest sensation.

cocktails.name: 黃金蘋果
cocktails.taste: 甜蜜的蘋果與蘋果白蘭地的絕妙融合
cocktails.taste_en: The wonderful blend of sweet apple and apple brandy
cocktails.description: 特選蘋果白蘭地混合特調蘋果汁和一點點肉桂，呈現如黃金般的色澤和滋味。
cocktails.description_en: Select apple brandy mixed with special apple juice and a hint of cinnamon, presenting a golden color and taste.

cocktails.name: 冰火玫瑰
cocktails.taste: 花香醇厚，伴隨辣椒的微辣感
cocktails.taste_en: Rich floral scent with a hint of spiciness from chili
cocktails.description: 使用玫瑰花瓣酒和辣椒朗姆酒為基底，加入檸檬汁增添清新感，是一款充滿對比美感的調酒。
cocktails.description_en: Based on rose petal liqueur and chili rum, added with lemon juice for a refreshing taste, this cocktail is full of contrasting beauty.

cocktails.name: 蜂蜜蘋果氣泡
cocktails.taste: 甜中帶點微酸，蜂蜜的香甜與蘋果的清新交織
cocktails.taste_en: Sweet with a slightly sour hint, interweaving the sweetness of honey with the freshness of apple
cocktails.description: 以蘋果白蘭地為基底，加入蜂蜜糖漿和新鮮蘋果汁，最後頂部加上氣泡水的點綴。
cocktails.description_en: Based on apple brandy, added with honey syrup and fresh apple juice, topped off with sparkling water.

cocktails.name: 夜幕朗姆
cocktails.taste: 濃郁的朗姆酒風味，帶有淡淡的可可與咖啡香
cocktails.taste_en: Rich rum flavor with a hint of cocoa and coffee aroma
cocktails.description: 黑朗姆酒與白朗姆酒的混合，加入一小勺可可粉和咖啡利口酒，完美的夜晚伴侶。
cocktails.description_en: A blend of dark and white rum, added with a teaspoon of cocoa powder and coffee liqueur, the perfect companion for the night.

cocktails.name: 荔枝玫瑰驚喜
cocktails.taste: 荔枝的甜美結合玫瑰花瓣的芬芳，清爽而馥郁
cocktails.taste_en: The sweetness of lychee combined with the fragrance of rose petals, refreshing and fragrant
cocktails.description: 以荔枝酒為基底，加入少量的玫瑰水和新鮮荔枝，裝飾以玫瑰花瓣，愛情的滋味。
cocktails.description_en: Based on lychee liqueur, added with a small amount of rose water and fresh lychees, garnished with rose petals, the taste of love.

cocktails.name: 辛辣生薑啤酒
cocktails.taste: 強烈的生薑辛辣，清爽且提神
cocktails.taste_en: Strong spicy ginger, refreshing and invigorating
cocktails.description: 全天然的生薑汁與檸檬汁混合，加入糖漿調整甜度，非酒精飲品中的活力之選。
cocktails.description_en: A mix of all-natural ginger juice and lemon juice, added with syrup to adjust sweetness, a vibrant choice among non-alcoholic drinks.

cocktails.name: 經典奈格羅尼
cocktails.taste: 苦甜平衡，帶有一絲橙香
cocktails.taste_en: Balanced bittersweet with a hint of orange
cocktails.description: 等份的琴酒、苦艾酒與紅味美思混合，搭配橙片裝飾，是一款經典的義大利調酒。
cocktails.description_en: Equal parts of gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth mixed together, garnished with an orange slice, a classic Italian cocktail.

cocktails.name: 梅子威士忌酸
cocktails.taste: 酸甜達到完美平衡，梅子的香味使其更添層次
cocktails.taste_en: Sweet and sour perfectly balanced, enhanced with the aroma of plum for an added layer
cocktails.description: 將波本威士忌與新鮮檸檬汁、梅子糖漿相結合，裝飾以梅片，一款具有東方風味的調酒。
cocktails.description_en: Combines bourbon whiskey with fresh lemon juice and plum syrup, garnished with slices of plum, a cocktail with an Oriental flavor.

cocktails.name: 焦糖莫吉托
cocktails.taste: 甜與清新的薄荷感完美融合，焦糖帶來溫暖的甜感
cocktails.taste_en: The sweetness and refreshing mint perfectly blended, with caramel bringing a warm sweetness
cocktails.description: 傳統莫吉托的基礎上加入焦糖糖漿，再搭配薄荷、萊姆和蘇打水，為經典莫吉托增添了一絲創新。
cocktails.description_en: Based on the traditional mojito with the addition of caramel syrup, along with mint, lime, and soda water, adding a twist to the classic mojito.

cocktails.name: 薰衣草檸檬汁
cocktails.taste: 清新檸檬的酸甜與薰衣草的花香完美交織
cocktails.taste_en: The perfect interweaving of fresh lemon's sweet and sour notes with the aromatic fragrance of lavender
cocktails.description: 新鮮檸檬汁與薰衣草糖漿的搭配，再加入適量的冷水或氣泡水，無酒精的選擇，清新迷人。
cocktails.description_en: This delightful non-alcoholic drink blends fresh lemon juice with homemade lavender syrup, topped with a choice of still or sparkling water. The result is a refreshing and aromatic beverage that beautifully marries the sweet and tartness of lemon with the soothing floral essence of lavender.
